converse.line: Welcome to the library! Do you have a library card?
No, I don't. Are they free?
Yep, the free version allows you to take out one book for a week. But if you want the premium version, where you get up to 10 books out for two months each, I can set you up for only #20.00 a month!
I'll take the free version, please (I'm too poor to afford the premium version.)
Here you go! If you ever want to upgrade, just let me know.

random.line: Do you have "Catcher in the Rye"?
That's an old book! Salinger, right? Some English teacher checked out all our copies. Sorry!
Really? Oh, I think it might have been my brother, actually. He really likes sci-fi.
It's a great genre. I personally prefer romance novels, myself.
Does anyone actually buy the premium membership?
For my family, it is. Sorry.

converse.line: Do you have a copy of the Cerzan in stock?
Yes, we do. If you don't mind me asking, why do you need it?
I'm trying to save some one from a life of loneliness.
Ah, so you're teaching them religion? That will help.
Let's go with that. (Not quite what I'm doing. Actually, I think it's the opposite.)
